body:
Comment 11 by **cgmurray**: 
I understand :-)
The confusion from my side is purely related to lack of motivation why pointers to
interfaces aren't compatible. At least my intuition about assignment rules are either
based on soundness, e.g. covariance and such, or related to direct incompatibility. 
The specification is great but the reasons for certain decisions are even more important
imo. In this particular case I presume it's not related to type-system soundness but
rather implementation and performance related.
